source:
%%pyspark
dbo_orders_names = [
  'SourceSystemOrderID',
  'CustomerID',
  'OrderDate',
  'ShipDate',
  'TotalCost',
  'OrderCreatedDate',
  'OrderUpdatedDate'
]

dbo_orders = spark.read.csv('abfss://demodatabricks@datalakeec44.dfs.core.windows.net/dboOrders.csv', header=True, inferSchema=True)
dbo_orders = dbo_orders.toDF(*dbo_orders_names)

# display(dbo_orders)
dbo_orders.show(10)

dbo_order_details_names = [
  'OrderDetailID',
  'SourceSystemOrderID',
  'MovieID',
  'Quantity',
  'UnitCost',
  'LineNumber',
  'OrderDetailCreatedDate',
  'OrderDetailUpdatedDate'
]
dbo_order_details = spark.read.csv("abfss://demodatabricks@datalakeec44.dfs.core.windows.net/dboOrderDetails.csv", header=True, inferSchema=True)
dbo_order_details = dbo_order_details.toDF(*dbo_order_details_names)
dbo_order_details.show(10)
